title: Weekly Shaker Heights Area Real Estate Market Activity Update
posting_body: Happy Fathers Day.
City of Shaker Heights "Free COVID 19 Vaccine Clinic" event occurred on Wednesday, 06/15/22 from 4:00 PM to 6:00 PM at the Shaker Heights Fire Station.
Shaker Heights Diversity, Equity & Inclusion Committee had a meeting on Thursday, 06/16/22 from 8:00 AM to 9:00 AM.
Shaker Heights Welcoming and Inclusion Subcommittee had a meeting on the same day from 6:30 PM to 7:45 PM at the Shaker Heights Main Library.
Beachwood "Calathea Spring Quartet & Isabel Mearini, Pianist" event occurred on the same day from 6:30 PM to 8:00 PM at the Community Center.
Shaker Heights " Drive Thru Food Distribution" event occurred on Friday, 06/17/22 from 10:00 AM to 1:00 PM at the Southpointe Hospital.
Beachwood "Red Cross Blood Drive" event occurred on Friday, 06/17/22 from 1:00 PM to 7:00 PM at the Community Center.
"Makers Market At The Van Aken District" event occurred on the weekend of 06/18/22 to 06/19/22 from 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM.
Shaker Heights " Chat With The Mayor" event occurred on the same weekend from 10:30 AM to 11:30 AM outside the Market Hall at the Van Aken District.
Shaker Heights Juneteenth event occurred on Sunday, 06/19/22. "
Dads Day Run" event occurred on the same day at 7:30 AM at the Colonnade, greenspace near the Main Library.
Monday, 06/21/22 was the Juneteenth.
Shaker Heights Hunger Center had a meeting on the same day from 10:00 AM to 1:00 PM.
Beachwood Architectural Board of Review had a meeting on the same day from 4:30 PM to 5:30 PM.
Beachwood "Blue Lunch, Swing & Blues Concert" event occurred on the same day from 6:30 PM to 8:00 PM.
Beachwood City Council had a meeting on the same day from 7:00 PM to 9:00 PM.
Shaker Heights Finance Committee had a video conference meeting on Monday, 06/21/22 from 8:00 AM to 9:00 AM.
Shaker Heights Architectural Board of  Review had a video conference meeting on the same day from 8:00 AM o 11:00 AM.
Shaker Heights City Council had a video conference work session meeting on the same day from 12:00 PM to 1:00 PM.
Shaker Heights Public Art Task Force had a video conference meeting on the same day from 6:30 PM to 7:30 PM.

There was a high level on the Beachwood and the Shaker Heights area real estate market this week.7 single family homes, 1 two family home, 4 condominiums and 1 residential zoned parcel of land were listed for sale.
2 condominiums, 1 multifamily homes and 1 residential zoned parcel of land were listed for rent.
1 two family home listing was returned to market.
3 single family home listing changed to contract.
The price was reduced for  5 single family homes and for 1 condominium.
19 single family home listings and 2 condominium listing began awaiting sale.
1 single family home listing started awaiting rental.
11 single family homes, 3 two family homes and 6 condominiums were sold.
2 single family home listings,1 two family home listing and 1 multifamily home listing were withdrawn.
1 single family home listing and 1 two family home listing were placed temporary off market.
1 single family home listing expired.
